channel.title: The Sprawl, Girl Underground, Balikbayan & The DIE RPG Kickstarter
channel.description:
@swordqueen and @Auzumel_S bring on Kieron Gillen @kierongillen - comics writer and game designer to talk about these games as well as the DIE Kickstarter based on his amazing series.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/the-sprawl-girl-underground-balikbayan

item.title: The Sprawl, Girl Underground, Balikbayan & The DIE RPG Kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @kierongillen
item.description:
@kierongillen wrote:

Thank you! I was doing a reading before I even had a chance to think “Wait - is this a good idea?” so I’m glad it worked for you

Read full topic
item.source: The Sprawl, Girl Underground, Balikbayan & The DIE RPG Kickstarter

item.title: The Sprawl, Girl Underground, Balikbayan & The DIE RPG Kickstarter
item.dc:creator: @SolidStrider
item.description:
@SolidStrider wrote:

@kierongillen’s reading of the prompts from his bestiary was so amazing. I could feel my brain sparking, spinning and running off with those descriptions.

I dropped everything I was doing and backed the Kickstarter on the spot. Thank you for sharing!

Read full topic
